body.name: OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Shampoo & Conditioner Set, (packaging may vary), Purple, 13 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)

features: PLUMP UP THE VOLUME: The 13-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Shampoo and Conditioner gives thin strands a thickening boost, volumizing them into fuller and more abundant-looking locks
THICKER, FULLER, HEALTHIER: Ideal for flat to medium volume hair, this volumizing duo leaves hair feeling thicker and healthy-looking as it cleanses

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: The nutrient-rich, plump-it-up formula contains vitamin B7 biotin, which helps strengthen hair to maintain growth, collagen, a building block for healthy hair, and hydrolyzed wheat proteins

ALL-AROUND SENSORY EXPERIENCE: The bergamot, jasmine and vanilla scent leaves your locks smelling irresistibly good every time you lather up. Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle on your tresses
BEAUTY PURE & SIMPLE: For best results, use this OGX Biotin & Collagen hair care collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand
body.description: Plump up the volume in thin hair with the OGX Thick & Full + Biotin & Collagen Hair Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner. Ideal for flat to medium volume hair, leaving hair feeling fuller and helping to create more abundant-looking locks. The nutrient-rich, plump-it-up formula, is infused with vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and wheat protein, and helps maintain growth for hair that's healthy-looking and feels thicker. Plus, the bergamot, jasmine and vanilla scent makes lathering up an all-around sensory experience that leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this thick hair shampoo and conditioner helps turn up the volume on your tresses. For best results, use this shampoo and conditioner with the entire OGX Biotin & Collagen hair care collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Biotin & Collagen Shampoo and Conditioner Set 13 oz The nutrient-rich, plump-it-up power of this haircare infused with Vitamin B7 biotin + collagen helps give each strand a beautiful boost. This dynamic duo will leave your hair feeling thicker, fuller and looking oh, so healthy. Nutrient rich volumizing shampoo Helps create the appearance of thicker hair Leaves hair looking full & voluptuous With Biotin, Collagen and Wheat Proteins Sulfate free surfactant hair care system

Benefits, Ingredients, Hair Type, Regimen Benefits Help thicken and texturize any hair type with just one use. This powerful formula helps volumize even the skinniest strands into fuller and more abundant looking locks. Ingredients An exclusive blend with Vitamin B7 biotin, collagen, and hydrolyzed wheat protein, helps to infuse nutrients into every strand and creates the appearance of thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair. Hair Type This product is good for everyday use, works well with most hair types. - Oily. - Damaged. - Color-Treated. - Frizzy. - Straight. Regimen For best results, use our entire Biotin & Collagen collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with our treatment to help moisturize and plumpen strands without weighing them down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for Less_Hair Product
reviews.reviewText: I have been ill and could not go out to get my hair washed at my salon. I needed something not so expensive until I could get out again. I was skeptical but practical in my purchase. First, the shampoo has a light really pleasant smell and lathers so much better than expensive products I have bought in the past. My hair had started to transition from perm to natural (Black Person-Kinky). I put just a small amount of the Conditioner on my edges and at my roots. It combed through with no trouble and very little loss of hair. This will be the shampoo/conditioner set I keep on hand now for emergencies and in between. I don't know what it did for others but its AWESOME for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shampoo and conditioner to see if it would aid in my journey with hair growth and strength. I think it's helping with both and you can't go wrong with collagen in my opinion. Also it's just my opinion;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product, Lousy Bottle
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shampoo/conditioner. The shampoo lathers nicely, has a good scent and adds body. The conditioner is also nice, but I cannot get it out of the bottle. The shape of the bottles makes it difficult to squeeze the product out, especially the conditioner, which is quite thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product love the scentUsed the product a couple of timeMy hair looked as if it’s growing plus I’m using other products in conjunction with this product

reviews.reviewText: I LOVED this product. Smells awesome. I bought 4 of these.... they are that great.

reviews.reviewText: I love the product it is thick and lathers well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adds life n body to thin, limp hair! Love it!
I've bought this a couple of times now. Love the product. Saved my over processed hair!

A mí se me estaba cayendo mucho el cabello y por eso lo adquirí y me encantó huele muy rico no es nada pesado para el cabello, le da mucho brillo y suavidad al cabello y lo más importante se me cae mucho menos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells amazing and way less hairloss
reviews.reviewText: I was a tib bit nervous at 32 bucks for a shampoo and conditioner. However I took the plunge as I am dealing with hair loss and thinning. It was delivered this morning and luckily on hair wash day. I also ordered a scalp massager as its suppose to stimulate hair growth. Any ways firstly this shampoo & conditioner smells amazing and is not over powering. After shampooing my hair did not feel dry and crappy which is amazing. Conditioner was left in for 3 minutes and left my hair feeling sooo soft. Now I usually while washing see lots of hair loss. I had way way less hairloss with this shampoo and conditioner combo and I mean wayyyy less. And wayyyy less hair loss after gently towel drying and brushing my hair. My hair is soft and easier to brush through. Will update after a bit more use but so far 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Me gustó cómo queda el cabello
Makes your hair feel soft and smooth
reviews.reviewText: Good value here. Biotin helps hair to grow thicker and quicker. Collagen makes hair stronger as well. It's a good combination and this brand of shampoo and conditioner came highly recommended by a hair transplant clinic and stated that it will and does help to keep your hair. It may not be a complete solution...but in combination with other treatments, it will help for sure. I do recommend it. I added a bit of castor oil and rosemary oil drops into it and shook it all up. Feels great in the hair.
